docTitle.titlePart: COLOR AND R.O.J. WITH JPEG2000 FOR WlRELESS VIDEOSURVEILLANCE

byline.affiliation:
University of Pau and Adour
LIUPPA Lab
KIT Informatique,

front.address: Chdteau Ned, Place Paul Bert, 64100 Bayonne, FRANCE
front.div:
ABSTRACT
For a videosurveillance application based on wireless trans-
mission of images acquired with a static camera, we investi-
gate two features within JPEGZW0, namely the choice of a
nonlincar color transform in order to improve color render-
ing at very high compression ratios, and the unsupervised
extraction of regions of interest (ROI) by motion detection.
